title: Pecan Pie with Maple Syrup
ingredients: ½ cup packed light brown sugar
1 ¼ cups pecan halves or pieces
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place a rack in the lowest position.
Step 2: Mix maple syrup, brown sugar, eggs, melted butter, and vanilla in a large bowl until well blended. Stir in pecans until coated, then pour batter into the pie shell.
Step 3: Bake on the lower rack of the preheated oven until the pie shell is golden brown and the filling is set, 35 to 40 minutes.
